content.text: I'm looking for someone who loves to cook. Would you say that's you?
Yes, I love to cook. I used to work as a chef.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. I once worked as a circus freak, showing off my third thumb to the public.
That's so interesting! I've never met a circus freak before.
Me neither! It was a lot of fun, but it didn't pay well.
I can imagine. What are some of your favorite things to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of foods, but my favorite is probably pasta.
Pasta is my favorite too! I love making different types of sauces.
Me too! I love making a big pot of pasta and having leftovers for the week.
That's a great idea! I'm always looking for ways to save money on food.
I'm the same way. I love to find ways to cook delicious meals on a budget.
Me too! I think we'd get along great.
